alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; Madison; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 3:27PM CDT until May 10 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hardeman County in west Tennessee... Northwestern McNairy County in west Tennessee... Southeastern Madison County in west Tennessee... Western Chester County in west Tennessee... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Masseyville, or near Henderson, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Henderson, Selmer, Chickasaw State Forest, Chickasaw State Park, Silerton, Masseyville, Robertson, McNairy, Bethel Springs, Finger, Medon, Forty Forks, Pinson, Rose Creek, Pine Top, Parkburg, Woodville, Madison Hall, Hickory Corners and Deanburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
